content: this pattern includes three charts for three different mug cozy patterns charts a b and c the mug cozies are knit flat on 4 5mm needles and only require 12-18 grams of worsted weight yarn 26-40 yds there is no gauge swatch necessary because the project can be measured against your mug of choice to ensure good fit to adjust the fit you can go up or down a needle size alternatively you could add or reduce the number of edge stitches in the garter edge of the mug cozy materials 1 suggested yarn 12-18g knitpicks wool of the andes in shade cloud affiliate link 1 i love making free patterns if you are able please support my work as a designer by making your next knitpicks purchase through my affiliate link 2 small button needles 4 5mm us size 7 notions tapestry needle scissors 1 https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=89047&awinaffid=2657402&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww knitpicks com%2fcloud%2fp%2f23432
